name: Infinite Shootout
description:
I am a twelve year old solo(mostly) indie dev this is my first solo jam(I did one with my family, I did moving platforms). I hope I can get (at least)one pretty successful game out there before I hit 25.

I started with python, then moved on to Unity. I have been doing Unity for two years so far and did four python years before that.

    Don't let my age fool you though, I am good at most types of coding so far(2D and 3D characters, coding, and I’m okay at sound effects(no I’m not)).

    FOR THE MEMES!
